summary: A test suite that validates the computation of concatenated minimum permutation word error rate (cpWER) across diverse scenarios, including single-word cases, over‑ and under‑counting, perfect matches, speaker confusion combined with ASR errors, as well as auxiliary functions for online DER statistics and partial reference label extraction.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability of the cpWER metric used in speech recognition evaluation, enabling accurate performance reporting and error analysis for ASR systems.
